>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/governance/lifecycle/scheduled/{schedule_id}/cancel"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Cancels a pending scheduled transition. Only pending transitions can be cancelled.
